tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent treatment done by Dr Deepak Nakra 14 yrs back, I got My bridges and crowns made by him and I never felt any discomfort. The treatment was very painless. Now I have come again after 14 years from Sonepat and the treatment is completed in just 2 visits. I recommend Dental World to all my family and friends. If anyone wants best treatment,  don't think about distance and come here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I Am Extremely Grateful For Dr Deepak Nakra For His Devotion Towards My Treatment Since The Time I Have Been Visiting Him . He Is A Thorough Professional Dr & His Approach Makes A Patient Feel Comfortable During His Work Process . I Am Extremely Thankful That Dr Deepak Nakra Has Attended My Wife Jyoti Adlakha At All Times Even Though We Were Going Through This On Going Corona Virus Period . His Clinic Gives A Sigh Of Relief Once You Enter . Its Very Refreshing With A Good Aroma , Very Hygenic, & With A Soft Music In Back Ground Makes A Patient Feel Relaxed . He Is Very Efficent In His Work & His Hands Work Magic . He Has Always Supported & Responded During Any Hour Of Need For Pain Related To My Wifes Dental Problem . He & His Wife Ms Harveen Nakra Are Working Very Very Hard & Almost All Patients Go Back Smiling . & Yes He Attends All Patients With Prior Appointment & Its Always Like No Waiting & No Patient In His Clinic At The Time One Enters It . His Staff Are Also Very Efficent & Follow All Precautions i.e. Temperature Check, Sanitizing, Wearing Of Gown, Head Cap, Shoe Cover Of Patient & Themseves Follow All Protocols . The Most Humble & Generous Couple Dr Deepak & Dr Harveen Nakra I Have Ever Come Across . God Bless Dental World & On Their Onward Journey .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went for the crowns treatment, got 4 front tooth done.
Both the doctors are amazing, from the consultation to the final treatment they were accessible 24*7.
My treatment was done by Dr. Deepak who is a very cooperative and patient listener, he considered all the aspects carefully and did the treatment.
Also, during my treatment sittings he made me feel so comfortable that I could not even feel that I am undergoing any such treatment.

Would recommend everyone to visit the Dental world clinic for any kind of dental treatments as they take up full responsibility to cure it and give you the best dental results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,
review: Dr Deepak did painless implants for me for full mouth.He is an amazing painless dentist I have ever seen .Best experience ever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the clinic when I fractured my tooth. I had severe pain. Dr.Deepak Nakra was very professional and suggested an implant to replace the tooth. After a quick consultation we decided to do the surgery in the same sitting. The procedure was quick and painless. I would recommend Dr.Deepak to anyone looking for good dental implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Deepak Nakra is very efficient and knows his work most thoroughly. He was so fast and good that before I realised what was happening it was over! Painless and perfect. 
At my age I was so apprehensive going to a dentist but he made it so easy for me. 
The clinic is most hygiene conscious and very comfortable too. 
I would recommend Dr Deepak Nakra to anyone who needs any kind of dental intervention . He is the best.

tags: None
review: It was a very pleasant experience. Proper examination was done for all teeth and doctor provided multiple solutions and then suggested the best suitable. The procedure was done quickly and cleanly. All my questions/doubts were properly addressed. I am very much happy with the consultation and procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Deepak Nakra is the most talented and full of generosity. He did crowns for my father who was unable to eat and was in lot of discomfort. Dr Deepak Nakra came forward and did his treatment with lot of care and precautions during Covid time when no doctor was available for help. Will thank him for his help ... care and generosity üôèüèª

review: First of all, Dr Deepak clearly communicated the feasible treatment options and helped me decide the best amongst them. He was an exceptional doctor. He was available throughout for any and all emergencies and queries. He didn‚Äôt rush through the treatment and made sure that it was done right.
